## TeamsFxAdaptiveCardActionHandler.handleActionInvoked() method

The handler function that will be invoked when the action is fired.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
handleActionInvoked(context: TurnContext, actionData: any): Promise<IAdaptiveCard | CardPromptMessage | void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | TurnContext | The turn context. |
|  actionData | any | The contextual data that associated with the action. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;IAdaptiveCard \| [CardPromptMessage](./teamsfx.cardpromptmessage.md) \| void&gt;
